reviewText: Love the show just wish all 5 seasons were available. On dvd. Tia and the crew are wonderful dog people.
This is a wonderful DVD set.  It's hard to tear yourself away once you start watching.  Both the dogs and the people are admirable in this series.  Looking forward to the next set!
It was great. I Didn't have any problems with the dics. I would reccomend these two seasons of pitbulls and parolees to anyone.

Very good.  Am wondering what Animal Planet's business model is. Fairly underwhelmed with their help desk support also.  Asked a question over a month ago.  They responded saying that they would have an answer in 24 hours.  Never heard from them.  They seem to be pushing streaming video as opposed to DVD.  A significant problem is that you need to be connected (reliably) to take advantage of streaming video.  If streaming video is going to be their only offering, they just lost me as a customer. Also don't understand their model of only posting clips rather than full episodes on hulu or netflix.  For the limited number of times I do use streaming video service, not sure what value to me is the clip as opposed to the whole show.
Love the work Tia does with the pit bulls and how she problem solves everything that goes on at Villalobos.
pit bulls are treated badly all over the world and this show told me they ARE NOT that bad. I learned to love them but I do fell a little bad for them  I love this show and you should watch it
Love this show and bought it for a gift for a friend who now watches this TV show
GREAT !!!!!
excellent.
we just got this last month wife loves this program now she is collecting the series
love the show and love what she's doing
We love this show
SUPPORT THIS SHOW AND SUPPORT THESE DOGS!!!
Brill
This is the coolest tv show ever
Great TV show. Unfortunately there is abuse to dogs. It will either make you sad or mad or both

I love the Pit Bulls and Parolees shows but I was never able to see all of the first two seasons.  Netflix only offered from Season 3 on and I see the more current seasons through Amazon Prime (I buy the new season each year) as I don't get Animal Planet in my cable package.  I finally broke down and purchased Seasons 1 & 2 although I thought they were a little pricey but they were well worth it.  Now I feel that I have the whole picture of Vialobos and Tia and her family.
My favorite show.  Watch it over & over.
Love the reality. Love learning about these people's lives.
Amazing.  I love the show on Animal Planet and if it helps the dogs even better.
Excellent show!!!
This show is awesome. I love all the people and especially the dogs.
Love this show sooooo much!

The show is one of my favorite television shows.  I hadn't started watching it from the beginning so I was really pleased that Seasons one and two were out there.  Now I can follow the "story." Thanks
Love these shows. Always buy the DVD's/BlueRay so I can watch even without internet access.
Great series. edgy realistic look at a rescue and pitbulls. with real characters you get to see the love of one family trying to help a misunderstood breed of dog. be prepared to cry and rejoice
Love this show and great DVDs
Best show on Animal Planet.

Villalobos does such great work. I admire Tia Torres and her family. The rescues they do to save Pitbulls and other dogs is so brilliant. They survive on donations which I now send to them monthly  I support them wholeheartedly.  Had I not watched this DVD, I would never had known about them. Now I watch the TV show regularly.
I love this show
Love this reality tv show
Absolutely love this show, this is the only place I can find season 1 and 2 I already had all the other seasons. Thanks so much for getting it to me so quickly and for such a good price :)
my husband and I are fans of tia and her cause
The show is awesome.  The Dad's are of great quality.  Looking forward to purchasing the other seasons.
LOVE IT, THE SHOWS ARE GREAT AND YOU CAN LEARN A LOT ABOUT PIT BULLS, AND THE PEOPLE WHO WORK WITH THEM

Love love love.
